long_description: Keep 3-days worth of food on hand in case of disaster with the Mountain House 72-Hour Emergency kit. Kit provides enough packaged, freeze-dried meals for a single person for 72 hrs.; includes 6 entrees and 3 breakfast meals. Includes 2 Beef Stroganoff with Noodles meals, 2 Pasta Primavera Vegetarian meals, 1 Rice and Chicken meal and 1 Chicken Teriyaki with Rice meal. For breakfast, enjoy the 2 Scrambled Eggs with Bacon meals and the single Granola with Milk meal. Meals are easy to prepare-just mix contents with boiling water in the pouch provided, let stand for a few minutes, and then serve. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Keep 3-days worth of food on hand in case of disaster with the Mountain House 72-Hour Emergency kit.
